title: My first Quarto document
text:
Data
My data come from the palmerpenguins package.

library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)


Three species of penguins.

title: My first Quarto document
text:
Species
Figure 1 shows the distribution of three species in the dataset.


ggplot(penguins, aes(x = species)) +
  geom_bar() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(
    x = "Species",
    y = "Count",
    Title = "Palmer Penguins",
    Subtitle = "From palmerpenguins package"
  )





Figure 1: Barplot of species of penguins, with the most common being Adelie, then Gentoo, then Chinstrap.

title: My first Quarto document
text:
Penguins
In Table 1, we see the first six penguins from the dataset.

penguins |>
  slice_head(n = 6) |>
  gt()





Table 1:  First six penguins in the dataset. 
  
  
    
      species
      island
      bill_length_mm
      bill_depth_mm
      flipper_length_mm
      body_mass_g
      sex

title: My first Quarto document
text:
(Gorman, Williams, and Fraser 2014)My data come from the palmerpenguins package.

library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)




Three species of penguins.





Figure 1 shows the distribution of three species in the dataset.

ggplot(penguins, aes(x = species)) +
  geom_bar() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(
    x = "Species",
    y = "Count",
    Title = "Palmer Penguins",
    Subtitle = "From palmerpenguins package"
  )




Figure 1: Barplot of species of penguins, with the most common being Adelie, then Gentoo, then Chinstrap.







In Table 1, we see the first six penguins from the dataset.

penguins |>
  slice_head(n = 6) |>
  gt()
